data.text:
METAR Camp Shorabak Airfield - OAZI/OAZ

Camp Shorabak Airfield is a small airport in Helmand, Afghanistan. The airport is located at latitude 31.85024 and longitude 64.22368. The airport has one runway: 1L/19R. The ICAO airport code of this field is OAZI. The airport's IATA code is OAZ. The airport is in the Tehran FIR.

This aviation weather observation was made for Zabol Airport on August 15, 2024 11:30, local time.

Airport observations

The wind is from direction 360° with a speed of 23 kt.

Visibility is 8 km.

There are no significant clouds are observed. No ceiling has been observed.

The temperature and wind chill are 46 °C. The dew point is 12 °C, the relative humidity is 13%. The air pressure at sea level is 1000 hPa (QNH).

Daylight period

Today the sun rises at 05:38 and sets at 18:56. This applies to Camp Shorabak Airfield, the universal daylight period may be different. The difference between the local time and UTC is +4 hour 30 minutes. Daylight saving time is currently in progress.

Companies

We don't have information about companies on this airport.
